text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) vercel-labs/json-render | 96% | stars now 4136 → est 28597 (range 28572-28622)
   https://github.com/vercel-labs/json-render
2) DevAgentForge/Claude-Cowork | 94% | stars now 1372 → est 5807 (range 5782-5832)
   https://github.com/DevAgentForge/Claude-Cowork
3) z-libs/Zen-C | 94% | stars now 2685 → est 8110 (range 8085-8135)
   https://github.com/z-libs/Zen-C
4) torvalds/AudioNoise | 94% | stars now 3864 → est 8950 (range 8919-8981)
   https://github.com/torvalds/AudioNoise
5) vercel-labs/agent-browser | 93% | stars now 6511 → est 18620 (range 18565-18675)
   https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-browser

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
